articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Alternate Prime Minister of Israel, Yair Lapid.

10:20 a.m. The Prime Minister will virtually join Premier of Nova Scotia Iain Rankin, Minister of Families, Children and Social Development Ahmed Hussen, Minister of Fisheries, Oceans and the Canadian Coast Guard Bernadette Jordan, and Member of Parliament for Halifax West Geoff Regan to make an early learning and child care announcement. A media availability will follow.

Notes for media:

  • Media who wish to attend the event in Halifax must register with the media contact below. Attendees will be required to wear masks and follow other public health directives. Other media who wish to participate virtually must also register with the contact below.
  • Media contact:
    Jasmine Flemming
    Government of Nova Scotia
    902-220-9665
    Jasmine.Flemming@novascotia.ca

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will convene a meeting of the Incident Response Group to discuss the wildfires and extreme weather impacts in Western Canada.

Closed to media.

 The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of New Zealand, Jacinda Ardern.
